TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComputerPrincipal extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal

summary.span: 封裝本身為電腦帳戶的主體。

span.span: Encapsulates principals that are computer accounts.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 呼叫 之前，必須先在物件上設定 Context 屬性。

span.span: The Context property must be set on the object prior to calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在建立時，不會保存電腦主體帳戶。The computer principal account is not persisted when it is created. 若要保存的帳戶，請呼叫方法。To persist the account, call the method.

param.span: 針對執行的作業指定伺服器或網域的 。

span.span: The that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並將它指派至指定的內容。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and assigns it to the specified context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在建立時，不會保存電腦主體帳戶。The computer principal account is not persisted when it is created. 若要儲存此帳戶，請呼叫方法。To save the account, call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public ComputerPrincipal (System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext context, string samAccountName, string password, bool enabled);

param.name: context
param.span: 針對執行的作業指定伺服器或網域的 。

span.span: The that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.

param.name: samAccountName
param.span: 這個電腦主體的 SAM 帳戶名稱。

span.span: The SAM account name for this computer principal.

param.name: password
param.span: 這個帳戶的密碼。

span.span: The password for this account.

param.name: enabled
param.span: 布林值，指定是否已經啟用帳戶。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies whether the account is enabled.

summary.span: 使用指定的內容、SAM 帳戶名稱、密碼和啟用的值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified context, SAM account name, password, and enabled value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在建立時，不會保存電腦主體帳戶。The computer principal account is not persisted when it is created. 若要保存的帳戶，請呼叫方法。To persist the account, call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalValueCollection<string> ServicePrincipalNames { get; }
.property instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalValueCollection`1<string> ServicePrincipalNames
Public ReadOnly Property ServicePrincipalNames As PrincipalValueCollection(Of String)

public: property System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::PrincipalValueCollection<System::String ^> ^ ServicePrincipalNames { System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::PrincipalValueCollection<System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得電腦帳戶之服務主要名稱 (SPN) 的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the Service Principal Names (SPN) for the computer account.

value.span: SPN 的集合，指定針對這個電腦註冊之帳戶的名稱。

span.span: A collection of SPNs that specify the names of the accounts registered for this computer.

value.span: SPN 的語法取決於基礎存放區。

span.span: The syntax for the SPN depends on the underlying store.
